title: Enhancing Service Quality Competency: Integrated Language Proficiency Development Workshop for Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can correct language problems encountered in workplace situations through feedback from three or more colleagues
Learners can provide at least two specific improvement suggestions for colleagues' written documents
Learners can create documents reflecting expertise based on work-academia integration cases

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
